body_html:
It's as the error message tells you:

/home/raggot/anaconda3/envs/fencing/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/cuda/__init__.py:97: UserWarning: 
    Found GPU0 GeForce GTX 650 Ti which is of cuda capability 3.0.
    PyTorch no longer supports this GPU because it is too old.

If you want to run on this GPU,you'll have to compile from source, but there's no guarantee compilation from source for cc 3.0 gpu will be supported in future.

body:
It's as the error message tells you:
```
/home/raggot/anaconda3/envs/fencing/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/cuda/__init__.py:97: UserWarning: 
    Found GPU0 GeForce GTX 650 Ti which is of cuda capability 3.0.
    PyTorch no longer supports this GPU because it is too old.
```
If you want to run on this GPU,you'll have to compile from source, but there's no guarantee compilation from source for cc 3.0 gpu will be supported in future.
